verbs.description: laundress (third-person singular simple present laundresses, present participle laundressing, simple past and past participle laundressed)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, historical) To act as a laundress.
examples: And oh, my dears, real washing is very different work from the dolls’ laundressing—standing round a wash-hand basin placed on a nursery chair, and wasting ever so much beautiful honey-soap in nice clean hot water  […]
